paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data from the study.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The two BRCA2 missense substitutions were seen in HER2-positive patients.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with breast cancer predisposition.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was previously associated with breast cancer through family or case-control studies.
